column5: Cozy cabin at Lake Mexia has nice lake views, fishing area, & boat launch available. Luxe queen size bed & comfy couch has quality sleeping for 3. A perfect get away spot for fishing or some peace & quiet! 35 miles from Waco and Fairfield, 99 miles to the Metroplex! Nice local boutiques and dining with excellent prices! Oversized bath tub /shower! Book your stay today!
column8: Cozy cabin with great lake views!
